finalFeedback.textNeeded: Well done, you have completed this interaction.

question.p: What do teenagers prefer to do when they have free time?

p.b: They prefer to be together with friends.

question.p: What do they do when they are with friends?

p.b: They go to the city, the cinema or eat out together. The more active ones do sports.

question.p: Which activities are nice to do at home with friends?

p.b: It is nice to listen to music or watch a DVD.

question.p: Which are popular weekend activities for friends?

p.b: Popular weekend activities are organising parties or going to the disco.

question.p: What are the ways of keeping in contact when teenagers are not together?

p.b: They speak on the phone, send text messages or write emails.
